original_text: They were haughty and did detestable things before me. Therefore I did away with them as you have seen.
korean_text: 거만하여 가증한 일을 내 앞에서 행하였음이라 그러므로 내가 보고 곧 그들을 없이 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: and did detestable things before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에서 가증한 일을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: Therefore I did away with them
